title: Calories in Bud Light Beer
meta_description: Learn calories in Bud Light beer for a standard 12 oz serving, plus carbs, protein, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz (355 ml) can or bottle of Bud Light lager, 4.2% ABV, chilled, no additives or mixers.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand batch, serving size, and temperature; check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A 12 oz Bud Light beer contains about 110 calories and 6.6 g of carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.a: Around 10 mg of sodium per 12 oz serving.

faqs.a: 0 g sugars and 0 g fiber per serving.
